author: ianna
body:
* Add ReflectionRotation tag processing
* Add a Trd2 division (though Trd1 is needed) - see issue https://github.com/AIDASoft/DD4hep/issues/460
* Make sure a default namespace is added to locally referred names
* Update Muon test configuration: it's fully parsed*)

*) See the note about Trd1
title: DD4hep: Add Reflection Rotation
